TopicTitle: KSP on Linux (steam) started crashing after loading screens

Articles.Content:
I launch KSP FROM steam.  I get a "Loading Vulkan shaders" pop up, the loading screen runs as normal, it gets most of the way thru the loading screen, but then the window disappears.  I found the KSP.log file, and the last log lines are as follows are shown below.  I'm a programmer, by trade so if you want me to run some grep commands against the KSP/steam logs let me know.

[LOG 21:41:21.171] vallstone_d.mat
